data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Lhuentse, Bhutan so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lhuentse, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Lhuentse to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 100 lost neighbors

data.prayer: the state of Lhuentse has (about) 0 people who know Jesus, 1 people who know about him culturally, and 99 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, encourage the church in Lhuentse, Bhutan to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Nyenpa people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Nyenpa people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Nyenpa people is yours.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Lhuentse, Bhutan to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Lhuentse a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Lhuentse, Bhutan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Lhuentse
location.people_groups_list: Bumthangpa, Adap, Nupbi, Monpa Black Mountain, Kheng
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bumthangpa (22,000), Adap (300), Nupbi (3,000), Monpa Black Mountain (500), Kheng (35,000)
